entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 8:08 PM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023
